Firebase + Google Sign In Use a Google Sign In credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Facebook Login Use a Facebook Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Twitter Login Use a Twitter Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Email/Password Authentication Use an email and password to authenticate with Firebase.
Anonymous Authentication Sign in anonymously and then later upgrade to a full Firebase Auth user.
Custom Authentication Use a custom token signed by your own server to authenticate with Firebase.
FirebaseUI Auth Use the FirebaseUI-Android library to authenticate with Firebase.

SMS Data PERMISSIONS REQUIRED Contacts and Call Info Device Info Camera and Storage Location Info and AppUsage By proceeding you accept and terms of service privacy policy.
To complete the process we need some additional details. Request you to select the best suited loan plan and proceed further to complete the application
To collect and monitor information about bank transactions, names of transacting parties, description of the transactions and amount for faster loan processing.
Contacts - To automatically identify potential references for your loan application. \n Call History - To gain information from your call logs that may be useful in the processing of your loan application.
To collect and monitor specific information about your device including IMEI number , call logs and phone number , in order to uniquely identify the device and ensure unauthorized devices are not able to act on your behalf, thereby help us prevent fraudulent activity.
Camera - To allow to take pictures required for loan application.\n Storage - To allow to upload documents and pictures for your loan application.
Location - To collect and monitor information about location of your device.\n App Usage - To gain information about your interest and likings to generate your credit score that may be useful in the processing of your loan application.
